segments.text: sure I am . I've been writing a blog for almost three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , it seems that I'm the only one who never blogs . When did you get started ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I began blogging when I first went to the US for my graduate strides .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what do you usually write about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: at first , I'll write about my life there . Like interesting things on the campus , travel stories , special English words that I come across . Sometimes , I'll post my pictures on my blog so my family an
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's interesting . How often do you write a blog ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's random . If there happen to be a lot of things going on , I may add several new entries in a week , and if I've got nothing to share , I may leave my blog untouched for weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: got it . Are you still updating your blog ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , since I came back from the US , I've been keeping the habit of blogging , simply to share my personal insights on any topic I like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: good for you . I know many people just leave their blogs alone after the first few months .
segments.speaker: S1
